TopicTitle: Can't launch any crafts in new, fresh install - RSS, RP-0 - 0.90

Articles.Content:
Can someone help me? Don't know whats going on. Everything works fine, yet when I try to launch, no dice... Idk what the problem is.

Output Log

Screenshot of Launch

Can someone help me? Don't know whats going on. Everything works fine, yet when I try to launch, no dice... Idk what the problem is.

Output Log

Screenshot of Launch

I can't help you with this problem, but i can confirm that i have the same issue. Fresh install of KSP 0.90, on 64-bit system.

Same thing happens to me, although only with vessels without any kerbonaut space. As soon as there is at least one command pod (even unmanned) the problem is gone (at least for me).

A useful workaround, but it'd rather not launch my probes from the top of empty command pod

EDIT:

Apparently, it was one of the mods - WernherChecker - that was causing it. As soon as I disabled it - no more problems. Hope it helps you too!

Edited December 30, 2014 by Bobson
